Construct a data dictionary from the SDB dump/reload

Run the SDB extract in batches of 20 tables at a time.  put them all together and upload to a conveient Google Doc.

```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(googlesheets4)
library(googledrive)
library(ourmirror)

today <- Sys.Date()


job_doc <- mrr_job_doc()

```

Get the images spreadsheet

```{r}
images_spreadsheet <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oKNLxr6IuZ_DQ4fUCyxE7qxF_RtIISay8QeoIz8o4ag/edit?gid=1239795533#gid=1239795533") |> 
  clean_names()
```

contents of google drive info

```{r}
drive_id_list <- drive_get(as_id(images_spreadsheet$id))
```
